name: Square Runner
storyline:
After waking up from a 40 year long outer-space nap, Earth's gravity starts pulling in our main character, who falls into the ocean near an archipelago.
Race around an archipelago, meet friends and foes and form a squad with your new friends. You will meet wild creatures, monarchs, legendary warriors and a society unlike any other....
Go back to your home planet and save earth from an alien invasion while running through levels like a maniac!
summary:
Square Runner is a fast-paced platformer where you try to go back to your home planet with the side effect of saving earth.
Will you return home or will you be stuck on earth forever? Form a squad, explore the unknown Adamian archipelago and fight creatures in Square Runner
